<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[71, 89, 547, 103]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[71, 120, 328, 146]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[71, 153, 497, 168]]<|/det|>
where \(V\) is the potential difference (p.d.) across the wire and \(I\) is the current in the wire.
